# Recommender - Adjust the scope of your recommendations
# Adjust the scope of your recommendations
**    Preview    — Recommendation Hub ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
This page shows you how to adjust the scope of your recommendations by organization, folder, or project.
content:
## Before you begin
Ensure that you have the [necessary roles and permissions](/recommender/docs/recommendation-hub/find-recommnedation-hub#before_you_begin) to view recommendations.
## Adjust the scope
- Click the Purview picker (Project selector) in the platform bar at the top of the page. - If you want to view your organization's recommendations, click the organization name in the list under the **All** tab.- Cost savings when scoped to an organization only show list pricing. To view custom pricing, ensure you have the right billing permissions and click into the recommendation. You can also scope to a project or use BigQuery export. For more information, see [Understanding cost recommendations](/recommender/docs/understand-cost-recs) .
- If you have a large organization with many recommendations, scoping to an organization and then viewing all recommendations may take a long time. To avoid this inconvenience, scope to a project or use BigQuery export.
- If you want to view all the recommendations available to a folder, click the folder name.
- If you want to view all the recommendations available to a project, click the project name.
 
- Click **Open** to view recommendations under the new scope.## What's next
